Package com.rjrudin.marklogic.junit

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NamespaceProvider
    Provides an array of Namespace objects that can be registered with JDOM for use in XPath expressions.
    TestHelper
    Interface for objects that help with writing tests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseTestHelper
    Provides convenience methods for instantiating new TestHelper and ResourceManager implementations.
    ClientTestHelper
    Intended to provide some common assertion methods that depend on calls to MarkLogic via the MarkLogic Java API - i.e.
    CustomDifferenceListener
    DifferenceListener implementation that captures all differences in a list which can then be retrieved.
    Fragment
    Encapsulates an XML fragment with a variety of methods for assisting with XPath-based assertions in a JUnit test.
    MarkLogicNamespaceProvider
    Implementation of NamespaceProvider that registers a handful of commonly-used MarkLogic namespaces and prefixes.
    PermissionsFragment
    Extends Fragment to provide MarkLogic permission-specific methods for assertions.
    XmlHelper
    Helper for tests that work with XML via JDOM2 and XmlUnit.
